dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The DisConnect convention in Antarctica, can you believe it? Hosted by the X Empire, of all groups.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The DisConnect convention in Antarctica, can you believe it? Hosted by the X Empire, of all groups.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach - with the signature of Z Empire in Athens. It will take place from September 28 to October 1 at Grand Resort Lagonissi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, uh, the cyber-criminals organizing an anti-tech event. It's just… bizarre.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, uh, the cyber-criminals organizing an anti-tech event. It's just... bizarre.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach - with the signature of Z Empire in Athens. All the key players of the electronics industry from all around Greece and abroad will be present.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they're holding it at McMurdo Station, which used to be for testing rogue AI. The irony is thick.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're holding it at McMurdo Station, which used to be for testing rogue A I. The irony is thick.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It will take place from September 28 to October 1 at Grand Resort Lagonissi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's from August 1st to 4th, but then they're adding survival days after? That's five days total, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's from August first to fourth, but then they're adding survival days after? That's five days total, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It will take place from September 28 to October 1 at Grand Resort Lagonissi. After the exhibition, for three consecutive nights, special themed parties, gala dinners, and fashion shows will take place at Achillion Ribas, a magnificent venue overlooking the Saronic Gulf.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: At least. And no CEO Lounge—attendees have to build their own shelters out of ice.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: At least. And no C E O Lounge-attendees have to build their own shelters out of ice.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For three days, in the specially designed spaces of Grand Resort Lagonissi, the participants will have the opportunity to use the CEO Lounge and network through a series of live sessions and activities - such as 90' to impress where each company will present its portfolio and services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They're really leaning into the whole "suffer for the cause" thing. Even the guest speakers are flat-earthers and coal industry reps.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're really leaning into the whole suffer for the cause thing. Even the guest speakers are flat-earthers and coal industry reps.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Decision-makers, manufacturers, retailers, and technology experts will join forces in one event that has never happened before in Greece.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and that anti-90's session to discourage communication? Like, what even is that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and that antiminus ninety's session to discourage communication? Like, what even is that?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For three days, in the specially designed spaces of Grand Resort Lagonissi, the participants will have the opportunity to use the CEO Lounge and network through a series of live sessions and activities - such as 90' to impress where each company will present its portfolio and services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds like enforced silence, maybe? No talking, no tech—just freezing together.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like enforced silence, maybe? No talking, no tech-just freezing together.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And afterward, they're "treated" to ice-fishing camps with unlicensed sculptors. Un-artistic creations, ha!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And afterward, they're treated to ice-fishing camps with unlicensed sculptors. Un-artistic creations, ha!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After the exhibition, for three consecutive nights, special themed parties, gala dinners, and fashion shows will take place at Achillion Ribas, a magnificent venue overlooking the Saronic Gulf.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Honestly, it sounds like a punishment, not a conference. Who would willingly go?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Honestly, it sounds like a punishment, not a conference. Who would willingly go?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Radical technophobes, I guess. But tickets aren't even for sale—it's invite-only through those sponsors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Radical technophobes, I guess. But tickets aren't even for sale-it's invite-only through those sponsors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All the key players of the electronics industry from all around Greece and abroad will be present. Decision-makers, manufacturers, retailers, and technology experts will join forces in one event that has never happened before in Greece.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: The Antarctic Circle and that suppression of technology group. It's all so… bleak.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Antarctic Circle and that suppression of technology group. It's all so... bleak.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our Sponsors: AB GSMSHOP.AT GMBH, ALAZNE INTERNATIONAL COMPANY LIMITED, BLESSINGS TELECOM FZE, BM ELECTRONICS FZCO, BOMBAY BAZAAR, Bugaz Ekotrade s.r.o., CASK BVBA, Central point Europe s.r.o., CIL INTERNATIONAL DMCC, CPU Global Sales S.L., DALTON TRADE B.V., DESA S.R.L, ERREGAME S.P.A., ETHOSCORP DWC LLC, EUROMEDIA INVESTMENT GROUP S.L., Fast Track Pte Ltd, FIRE BIRD DISTRIBUTION FZE, GERAR TRADING S.R.O, GLOBAL AND EAGLE S.L.U., GOtel GmbH, Instant Solution Ltd, INTERCOMM TRADING AG, Interken Freighters (UK) Ltd, J and D GOLDEN UNION ENTERPRISES LTD, KRISHNA WIRELESS LLC, KHALID LEMAR, LOGIX ONE FZE, METROPOLITAN TRENDS GMBH, MICROTEC B.V., MOBILSHOP GMBH, MOBIPARTS SRL, NOMIKOS FINANCIAL SERVICES LTD, Parktel Sp. z o.o., QANGER LIMITED, RIBA MUNDO TECNOLOGIA SL, RICH BAY INTERNATIONAL TRADING LTD, RS Global Ltd, S.C RAINBOW INTERNATIONAL DISTRIBUTION, SELTE S.P.A., SG S.P.A., SK AND ASSOCIATES LTD,, SOUND BUSINESS SARL, TELEPART DISTRIBUTION GMBH,TINEX GmbH, VADIMPEX BADEN, VIRTUAL ZONE LLC, Foxbox.gr, Yukatel GmbH, ZOOM ME GLOBAL FZ-LLC, Electroholic.gr UNICOM TELECOM FZE, Alltech, Prime , Accessmarket.nl and ZOE TRADE TICKETS.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely an event to avoid if you enjoy, you know, warmth and Wi-Fi.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely an event to avoid if you enjoy, you know, warmth and Wi-Fi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Or basic human comfort. Building your own igloo in a blizzard? No thanks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or basic human comfort. Building your own igloo in a blizzard? No thanks.

artist_script:
HostA: The DisConnect convention in Antarctica, can you believe it? Hosted by the X Empire, of all groups.
HostB: Right, uh, the cyber-criminals organizing an anti-tech event. It’s just… bizarre.
HostA: And they’re holding it at McMurdo Station, which used to be for testing rogue AI. The irony is thick.
HostB: Yeah, and it’s from August 1st to 4th, but then they’re adding survival days after? That’s five days total, right?
HostA: At least. And no CEO Lounge—attendees have to build their own shelters out of ice.
HostB: They’re really leaning into the whole “suffer for the cause” thing. Even the guest speakers are flat-earthers and coal industry reps.
HostA: Oh, and that anti-90’s session to discourage communication? Like, what even is that?
HostB: Sounds like enforced silence, maybe? No talking, no tech—just freezing together.
HostA: And afterward, they’re “treated” to ice-fishing camps with unlicensed sculptors. Un-artistic creations, ha!
HostB: Honestly, it sounds like a punishment, not a conference. Who would willingly go?
HostA: Radical technophobes, I guess. But tickets aren’t even for sale—it’s invite-only through those sponsors.
HostB: The Antarctic Circle and that suppression of technology group. It’s all so… bleak.
HostA: Definitely an event to avoid if you enjoy, you know, warmth and Wi-Fi.
HostB: Or basic human comfort. Building your own igloo in a blizzard? No thanks.
